thread.section_title: Crazy Factory Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Crazy Factory | www.crazy-factory.com
thread.title: Alexis Abel
thread.title_full: Crazy Factory bewertet von Alexis Abel

author: Alexis Abel
title: Alexis Abel
text:
Honestly, no issues to report with this company, though it should be noted that I only made a single purchase with them back in 2013/14 or so. No sort of shady gimmicks that I found, however. I ordered a few pieces of jewelry for my nose, tongue, and naval piercings and had no issues with poor quality, added fees, random charges, or missing items. Only thing I have to criticize is that it took some time to ship to me, I believe around a month or so, but that IS true to what they predicted when the items were purchased - that's just me being impatient.
Totally recommend!
